forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
